member.name: T:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.ColorHandler
member.summary: Class to handle color specific code.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.ColorHandler.StringToColor(System.String)
member.summary: Parse a web color type of string (for example "#FF0000") into a System.Drawing.Color object.

member.summary: Creates an instance of a CMYK structure.

member.summary: Provides methods to convert from a color space to an other.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.ColorSpace.ColorSpaceHelper.GetColorDistance(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Gets the "distance" between two colors. RGB colors must be normalized (eg. values in [0.0, 1.0]).

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.ColorSpace.ColorSpaceHelper.GetColorDistance(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Gets the "distance" between two colors. RGB colors must be normalized (eg. values in [0.0, 1.0]).

member.param: The alpha value used for each colors.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.ColorSpace.ColorSpaceHelper.GetSpectrumColors(System.Int32)
member.param: The alpha value used for each colors.

member.summary: Gets the int equivalent for a hexadecimal value.

member.summary: Converts a Hex color to a .net Color.
member.param: The desired hexadecimal color to convert.

member.summary: Converts a RGB color format to an hexadecimal color.

member.summary: Converts a RGB color format to an hexadecimal color.

member.name: T:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.BrightnessFilter
member.summary: Simple filter for adjusting brightness in images.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.BrightnessFilter.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The amount of change to be applied to the brightness. Entered as either a positive - to make it brighter - or negative - to make it darker - value (zero means no change).

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.ConvolveFilter.#ctor
member.summary: Construct a filter with a null kernel. This is only useful if you're going to change the kernel later on.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.ConvolveFilter.#ctor(System.Single[])
member.summary: Construct a filter with the given 3x3 kernel.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.ConvolveFilter.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Single[])
member.summary: Construct a filter with the given kernel.
member.param: The number of rows in the kernel.
The number of columns in the kernel.
An array of rows*cols floats containing the kernel.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.ConvolveFilter.#ctor(Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.Kernel)
member.summary: Construct a filter with the given 3x3 kernel.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.ConvolveFilter.ConvolveH(Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.Kernel,System.Int32[],System.Int32[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.ConvolveFilter.EdgeMode)
member.summary: Convolve with a kernel consisting of one row.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.ConvolveFilter.ConvolveV(Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.Kernel,System.Int32[],System.Int32[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.ConvolveFilter.EdgeMode)
member.summary: Convolve with a kernel consisting of one column.

member.name: F:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.ConvolveFilter.EdgeMode.Zero
member.summary: Treat pixels off the edge as zero.

member.name: F:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.ConvolveFilter.EdgeMode.Clamp
member.summary: Clamp pixels off the edge to the nearest edge.

member.name: F:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.ConvolveFilter.EdgeMode.Wrap
member.summary: Wrap pixels off the edge to the opposite edge.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.PixelUtils.Clamp(System.Int32)
member.summary: Clamp a value to the range 0..255

member.summary: Blur and transpose a block of ARGB pixels.

member.name: P:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.GaussianBlurFilter.Radius
member.summary: The radius of the kernel, and hence the amount of blur. The bigger the radius, the longer this filter will take.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.#ctor(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Create a KalikoImage from a System.Drawing.Image.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a KalikoImage with a defined width and height.

example.code: // Creating a new transparent image var image = new KalikoImage(640, 480);

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.#ctor(System.Drawing.Size)
member.summary: Create a KalikoImage with a defined width and height.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.#ctor(System.Drawing.Size,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Create a KalikoImage with a defined width, height and background color.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Create a KalikoImage with a defined width, height and background color.

example.code: // Creating a white image var image = new KalikoImage(640, 480, Color.White);

member.summary: Create a KalikoImage by loading an image from either disk or web URL.

member.summary: Create a KalikoImage from a stream.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.Clone
member.summary: Create a new image as a clone.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.SetFont(System.String,System.Single,System.Drawing.FontStyle)
member.summary: Set the font that will be used for text operations.

member.summary: Write text to image using the font assigned using SetFont Method.
member.param: Text that will be written on image

member.summary: Write text to image using the font assigned using SetFont Method rotated in the defined angle.
member.param: Text that will be written on image
Angle to rotate the text to

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.LoadImage(System.String)
member.summary: Load an image from local disk

member.summary: Load an image from a stream object (MemoryStream, Stream etc)

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.LoadImageFromUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Load an image from an URL

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.MakeImageNonIndexed
member.summary: Check if image has an indexed palette and if so convert to truecolor

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.Clear(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Clear the image and set background image to the specified color.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.GradientFill(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Makes a gradient fill top to bottom from one color to another.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.GradientFill(System.Drawing.Point,System.Drawing.Point,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Makes a gradient fill from point 1 to point 2 from one color to another.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.Scale(Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Scaling.ScalingBase)
member.summary: Scale the image using a defined scaling engine which can be CropScaling Class will crop the image so that the final result always has the given dimension, FitScaling Class will ensure that the complete image is visible inside the given dimension or PadScaling Class that will pad the image so that it cover the given dimension.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.BlitImage(System.String)
member.summary: Will load an image and place it on the destination image at top left corner.

example.code: // Load image and place on top, left of our image image.BlitImage(@"C:\Img\Stamp.png");

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.BlitImage(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Will load an image and place it on the destination image at the defined coordinates.

example.code: // Load image and place 10 pixels from the left and 20 pixels from the top image.BlitImage(@"C:\Img\Stamp.png", 10, 20);

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.BlitImage(Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage)
member.summary: Will take the source image and place it on the destination image at top left corner.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.BlitImage(Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Will take the source image and place it on the destination image at the defined coordinates.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.BlitImage(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Will take the source image and place it on the destination image at top left corner.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.BlitImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Will take the source image and place it on the destination image at the defined coordinates.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.BlitFill(System.String)
member.summary: Loads the defined image and use it as a pattern to fill the image (will be tiled if the destination image is larger than the source image).

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.BlitFill(Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage)
member.summary: Uses the defined image as a pattern to fill the image (will be tiled if the destination image is larger than the source image)..

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.BlitFill(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Uses the defined image as a pattern to fill the image (will be tiled if the destination image is larger than the source image)..

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.Crop(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Crop the image into the given dimensions.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.Resize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Resizes the image without any consideration of the current ratio. If you wish to make a ratio locked resize use Scale Method instead.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.StreamJpg(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Save image to the response stream in JPG-format. Ideal for sending realtime generated images to the web client requesting it.
member.remarks: This method will set the proper HTTP-headers such as filename and mime-type.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.StreamPng(System.String)
member.summary: Save image to the response stream in PNG-format. Ideal for sending realtime generated images to the web client requesting it.
member.remarks: This method will set the proper HTTP-headers such as filename and mime-type.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.StreamGif(System.String)
member.summary: Save image to the response stream in GIF-format. Ideal for sending realtime generated images to the web client requesting it.
member.remarks: This method will set the proper HTTP-headers such as filename and mime-type.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.SaveJpg(System.IO.Stream,System.Int64)
member.param: Stream to save the image to

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.SaveJpg(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Save image to file in JPG-format.

example.code: // Save image to file system in jpg format with quality setting 90 image.SaveJpg(@"C:\MyImages\Output.jpg", 90);

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.SavePng(System.String)
member.summary: Save image to file in PNG-format.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.SaveGif(System.String)
member.summary: Save image to file in GIF-format.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.SaveBmp(System.String)
member.summary: Save image to file in BMP-format.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.SaveImage(System.String,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Generic method that will save the image in the specified ImageFormat.
member.param: Image format to save the file in, for example ImageFormat.Tiff

example.code: // Save image to file system in the selected format image.SaveImage(@"C:\MyImages\Output.tif", ImageFormat.Tiff);

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.ApplyFilter(Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Filters.IFilter)
member.summary: Apply a filter to the current Image.
member.param: Any filter that supports the IFilter interface

member.name: P:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.Color
member.summary: Color used for graphical operations such as writing text on image.

member.name: P:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.IndexedPalette
member.summary: Check if the current image has an indexed palette.

member.name: P:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.IsPortrait
member.summary: Returns true if image has portrait ratio (higher than wide).

member.name: P:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.IsLandscape
member.summary: Returns true if image has landscape ratio (wider than high).

member.name: P:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.IsSquare
member.summary: Returns true if image has a 1:1 ratio (same width and height).

member.name: P:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.ByteArray
member.summary: Byte array matching PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb (bgrA in real life).

member.name: P:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage.IntArray
member.summary: Int array matching PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb (bgrA in real life)

member.name: T:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Scaling.ScalingBase
member.summary: Abstract class used by scaling engines.

member.name: M:Kaliko.ImageLibrary.Scaling.ScalingBase.Scale(Kaliko.ImageLibrary.KalikoImage)
member.summary: Core function that applies the scaling to the image.
